subject: Re: [junit] Testing Parsers.
msgSnippet: ... Take a look at Building Parsers With Java by Steve Metsker. He discusses test cases for parsers and the intended grammar. Johannes -- COMPUTERBILD 15/03:
messageBody:
>
> Hi,
> Any inputs on design of test suites for testing parsers are
> required. Please guide me.
>

Take a look at "Building Parsers With Java" by Steve Metsker. He discusses
test cases for parsers and the intended grammar.

Johannes
